Name: Invoke: Javelin
Desc:
Throws a sharp magical javelin that moves quickly between enemies and attacks them. When the Javelin hits an enemy, it will split into fragments and attack again.
This skill can be used to link with Invoke: Orb II. This skill is not affected by effects that increase the number of targets hit.
If Javelin hits a Crystal or an enemy, you will acquire a Crystal Shard. When you have collected a certain number of Crystal Shards, you can use Enchant Javelin. Enchant Javelin will automatically track enemies and charge the Crystal with a burst of magic.
The Javelin, Enchant Javelin, and Javelin Fragments will prioritize attacking the boss monster with the highest maximum HP.
Required Skill: Invoke: Javelin Lv. 30 or above
